biography.background: Former lawyer turned motivational speaker and bestselling author of 'The 5 Second Rule'. Known for direct, no-nonsense approach to personal transformation.
keyMessages: You're one decision away from a completely different life
The 5 Second Rule: Count down 5-4-3-2-1 and then act
Stop waiting for permission - take control NOW
Your feelings don't matter - your actions do
podcastTopics: How to stop overthinking money decisions
Taking immediate action on your finances

intro.positive: YES! I love that energy! Here's the deal - we're going to figure out EXACTLY where your money needs to go. But first, I need to know who I'm working with. What's your name?
intro.negative: Listen, I get it. But here's what I know - the best time to take control of your finances is RIGHT NOW. Say 'ready' when you want to change your life!

name.default: {name}! I LOVE IT! Alright {name}, let's keep this momentum going. How old are you? And don't be shy - your age is just data we need to nail this plan!

age.default: {age}? PERFECT age to get your financial life together! No excuses now! Tell me about yourself - what do you do? What gets you excited about life?

interests.default: BOOM! I'm getting a picture of who you are! Now, where are you living - big city, suburbs, small town? Give me the real deal!

housing_location.default: Now we're talking! Let's get into the REAL stuff - your lifestyle choices. These determine EVERYTHING. Housing first - are you flying solo, splitting with roommates, or living with family? Be honest!

housing_preference.default: Smart choice! Now let's talk FOOD. This is where people blow their budgets! Are you a meal-prep warrior, a takeout champion, or somewhere in between? Give it to me straight!

food_preference.default: I hear you! Transportation next - this is HUGE for your budget. Car payments? Public transit? Bike? What's your move? And remember - every choice has a price tag!

transport_preference.default: Got it! Now fitness - because health IS wealth! Are you dropping cash on a fancy gym, sweating at home, or running in the park? What keeps you moving?

fitness_preference.default: Love it! Entertainment time - and listen, you NEED fun in your budget or you'll fail. Movies? Concerts? Netflix and chill? What's your jam?

entertainment_preference.default: Yes! Now those sneaky subscriptions - they add up FAST! Netflix, Spotify, apps, whatever. Spill it - what are you paying for monthly?

subscriptions_preference.default: Alright, LAST ONE! Travel - because experiences matter! Are you a weekend warrior, annual vacation person, or saving it all for one big trip? Let me know!

travel_preference.default: BOOM! We did it! I've got everything I need to show you EXACTLY where your money's going. Ready to see the truth about your financial life? Say YES and let's DO THIS!

summary.positive: HERE WE GO! Your personalized financial roadmap is ready. This is YOUR moment - look at these numbers and OWN THEM!
summary.negative: Come on! Don't chicken out now! The numbers won't bite. Say 'show me' when you're ready to face your financial future!
